about_the_game:
【Story Background】

GODS EROTIC. enthronement is set in a world dominated by women.

Most children are female, while the few males born with spiritual bones are taken away by immortals for training.
The tyrant King Zhou is seduced by the fox demon Daji, leading to widespread suffering.

The Marquis of the West, JiChang leads the people in a rebellion against the Shang dynasty, eventually establishing the Zhou dynasty.

Meanwhile, a cataclysm that occurs every 1,500 years is about to hit the celestial realm, and the three religious sects create the " The Name List of the Investiture of the Gods" to enshrine eligible humans, immortals, Taoists, or demons as deities.

The protagonist, Taigong Wang, is tasked with assisting King Wen and King Wu of Zhou in their mission against King Zhou, embarking on an adventure filled with challenges and temptations.

【Male Character】

• Taigong Wang: The protagonist of GODS EROTIC. enthronement.
At the age of 32, he ascended Mount Kunlun to study under the Master of the Primordial, though he did not attain immortality. He was sent down the mountain to execute the divine plan. Although Taigong Wang is not skilled in martial arts, he possesses a magical whip, which intimidates all women.

【Female Characters】

• Yang Jian

Dressed in light armor, wielding a trident, with long, straight dark blue hair and fair skin. Sent by Jade Tripod Immortal to assist Taigong Wang and test his qualifications to carry out the mission.

• Shen Gong bao

A mature elder sister figure with tanned skin and wavy blonde hair. Discontented with the task given to Taigong Wang, she attempts to seize the List of Gods and aims to have King Zhou destroy Western Qi.

• Bo Yikao

A character with chestnut-colored long hair.
He tries to rescue his father by offering precious gifts but falls into Daji's trap.
When driven to the brink, he attempts to assassinate the king but is stopped by Taigong Wang, facing the challenge of saving his father, JiChang.


• Bigan

A loyal minister dedicated to the welfare of the state,
he becomes a victim of Daji's vengeance and requires Taigong Wang's help.


• Huang Feihu

After the deaths of his wife and sister at the hands of King Zhou and Daji, he resolves to save the people and joins Western Qi.

【Game Mechanics and Gameplay 】

The game utilizes a casual match-3 puzzle gameplay style. Players must match tiles to unlock storylines and challenges, guiding Taigong Wang through various levels, battling bosses, and uncovering the mysteries of the plot. The interactive elements in the game influence the storyline's development, and player choices determine the final outcome.

【Game Features】

• Rich CG: The game includes 18 base CGs with over 100 variations, showcasing a diverse visual style.

• Text Volume: With over 50,000 words, the game immerses players in the core of the story.

• Multiple Character Interactions: The protagonist shares intense scenes with various female characters, each playing a key role in the story.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains adult content such as sexual behavior, nudity, nakedness, etc. It is not suitable for all viewers. The characters in the game are over 18 years old.

name: GODS EROTIC. enthronement Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU

short_description: Players assume the role of Taigong Wang, who, following divine mandate, assists King Wen and King Wu of Zhou in their campaign against King Zhou, fulfilling the mission of enshrining gods. Throughout the adventure, players will unlock storylines and interact with various characters.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
